title: Ep. 179 "Dreaming of the First Day Out" ft. Lex P & Drea Nicole of Pour Minds
description:
We're still halfway quarantined and recording in the house so excuse any audio issues until we're back in the studio*** Our girls Lex P & Drea Nicole of Pour Minds join us to talk about quaranpeen, bdb's, and the crazy things we've done for sex and men.
